body: Yeah, on further questioning that correspondance didn't seem to be accurate.  This is intermittent, right?  The download is direct from S3, and for some reason S3 seems to have this problem more frequently than most HTTP services, and you'll need retry-on-failure logic.  IIRC you're using curl, which has `--retry`.

body_html: Yeah, on further questioning that correspondance didn't seem to be accurate. This is intermittent, right? The download is direct from S3, and for some reason S3 seems to have this problem more frequently than most HTTP services, and you'll need retry-on-failure logic.
